title: Runware vs Google Document AI: Which AI Tool is Better in 2025?
metaDescription: Compare Runware vs Google Document AI. See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best AI tool for your needs in 2025.
introduction: Choosing between Runware and Google Document AI? These AI tools serve different but sometimes overlapping purposes, each with unique strengths. This comparison breaks down the key differences to help you decide.

sections.title: Overview: Runware vs Google Document AI
paragraphs: Runware (developer tools) is Runware is a developer-focused API platform for real-time generation of images, videos, and audio powered by advanced AI models. Founded in 2023 and raising $50M in Series A funding in December 2025, it has powered over 10 billion creations for 200,000+ developers. Its unique value is providing a unified API to access multiple AI models (Stable Diffusion, DALL-E, video generators) with sub-second latency and enterprise-grade reliability.. It's known for api, image-generation, video-generation.

Google Document AI (nlp) is Google Document AI is a cloud-based platform that uses machine learning to automatically parse, classify, and extract structured data from scanned and digital documents. It targets businesses and developers looking to automate document-intensive workflows, offering pre-trained models for common document types and the ability to build custom processors. Its key differentiator is deep integration with the Google Cloud ecosystem and its use of Google's foundational AI research to deliver high-accuracy extraction with minimal configuration.. Users choose it for document-processing, intelligent-document-processing, optical-character-recognition.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: Runware: Real-time image generation API (Stable Diffusion, DALL-E, Midjourney-like), Video generation API with multiple models, Audio generation and text-to-speech

Google Document AI: Pre-trained processors for invoices, receipts, ID documents, contracts, and utility bills, Custom processor training for unique document layouts and data fields, Advanced OCR with handwriting recognition and layout preservation

verdict: Both Runware and Google Document AI are excellent AI tools. Your choice depends on specific needs: Runware for api, Google Document AI for document-processing.
